definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ez44, 17wool;—abs. ´[[ח]] Is 1:18, [[חָָמֶר]]; Le 13:48; cstr. [[חֶ֫מֶר]] Ez Eze 27:18 (v. infr.); sf. [[חַמְרִי]] Ho 2:7, Ho 2:11; —wool (usu. c. ([[ם]]) [[פִּשְׁתִּי]] flax, linen): in natural state ´[[גִּזַּת הַצּ]] Ju Jdg 6:37, ´[[אֵילִים ח]] 2Ki 3:4 (but constr. difficult, and ´[[ח]] perhaps gloss); Ho 2:7, Ho 2:11 (as gift of value); white Is 1:18 (sim.; ‖[[שֶׁלֶג ]]), sim. of snow Ps 147:6 (from white flakes); white  (?) wool as merchandise Ez Eze 27:18 ([[חָָחַר]] ´[[ח]], but on text v.[[חַ֫חַר]]), Pr 31:12; prey of moth Is 51:8 (sim.); made up into garments De 22:11, ´[[בֶּנֶד ח]] Le 13:47, Le 13:59 cf. v:Le 13:48, v:Le 13:52; [[בֶּגֶד]] om. Ez Eze 34:3, Eze 44:17.
